item.title: Tongue Tied [Shortfilm]

item.description: [ D.O.P., Sound Postproduction ] || WON PRICES: Best Cinematography, Best Sound, Best Film, Cinemadamare filmfestival. This film was realized in one week, from shooting, to editing and audio postproduction. Filmed and finished in Italy.

item.description: [ Camera, Sound Postproduction ] || : Best Sound, Best Film, Cinemadamare Filmfestival. Filming, editing and post audio was done in under 1 week. Everything was done in Italy during the film festival.

[  Camera, Sound Postproduction  ]  ||

item.title: The August Project [Feature length documentary]
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Directing, Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ] || The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about.
item.content:encoded:
[ Directing, Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ] ||

The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about.

item.title: Mohéli Laka Lodge
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Drone Pilot, Montage ] || One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 5 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium. Shot in a […]
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Drone Pilot, Montage  ]  ||

One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 5 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium. Shot in a Sony a6500, Ursa mini 4.6k and Mavic Pro.

item.title: Inclusive Education [Light For The World]
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Sound Postproduction ] || One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks and edited in both Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Editing, Sound Postproduction  ]  ||

One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks and edited in both Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.

item.title: Yper Museum exceeds borders
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Boomer, Post Soundproduction ] || Half was shot and the other half was boomed by me. I created 5 movies for the opening of Yper museum. Which are a combination of fiction and documentary, all featuring a fictional character named Gilbert. This is one of the 5 movies created. All shot and […]
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Editing, Boomer, Post Soundproduction  ]  ||
Half was shot and the other half was boomed by me.
I created 5 movies for the opening of Yper museum. Which are a combination of fiction and documentary, all featuring a fictional character named Gilbert. This is one of the 5 movies created. All shot and produced all East and West Flanders over 2 days.

item.title: Simon x Sara
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Sound, Drone pilot ] || Wedding video created for Simon and Sara. Shot with a one-man team, doing camera and sound on the wedding day. Shot with a Sony a6500 and Ursa Mini 4.6k, lavelier and senheiser 416.
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Editing, Sound, Drone pilot  ]  || 
Wedding video created for Simon and Sara. Shot with a one-man team, doing camera and sound on the wedding day. Shot with a Sony a6500 and Ursa Mini 4.6k, lavelier and senheiser 416.

item.title: Natasha x Lieven
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Sound ] || Wedding video for Natasha and Lieven, making sure they cab watch their wedding day back in all its grace. One-man crew doing both camera and sound. Shot on an Ursa mini 4.6k. Youtube compression is making the video jitter. Music removed due to copyright.
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Editing, Sound  ]  || 
Wedding video for Natasha and Lieven, making sure they cab watch their wedding day back in all its grace. One-man crew doing both camera and sound. Shot on an Ursa mini 4.6k. Youtube compression is making the video jitter. Music removed due to copyright.
